description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Join the battle on the planet Ur to defeat the oppressive regime of Moloch, the evil leader of an army of strange and sinister aliens! Over 60 level campaign, four player co-op, and in-game medals to earn!
